org.gbif.nub.lookup

Class HigherTaxaLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.nub.lookup.HigherTaxaLookup

  • public class HigherTaxaLookup
extends Object
    A tool to lookup synonyms for higher taxa names. It does a rather strong match and tries to normalize names a lot so we can use them for comparisons of entire higher classifications. The class uses file based dictionaries which are maintained on rs.gbif.org with OpenRefine based on real data found in occurrence and checklist records.

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        public String lookup(String higherTaxon)
        Lookup higher taxa synonym dictionary across all ranks and return the first match found
        Parameters:
        higherTaxon -
        Returns:
        the looked up accepted name or the original higherTaxon

      • lookup

        public String lookup(String higherTaxon,
            org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Rank rank)
        Lookup synonym for given higher rank. Can be null.
        Parameters:
        higherTaxon - higher rank name, case insensitive
        rank - the rank to lookup for
        Returns:
        the looked up accepted name, null for blacklisted names or the original higherTaxon if no synonym is known

      • isBlacklisted

        public boolean isBlacklisted(String name)
        Check for obvious, blacklisted garbage and return true if thats the case. The underlying set is hosted at http://rs.gbif.org/dictionaries/authority/blacklisted.txt

      • norm

        protected static String norm(String x)
        Returns:
        non empty uppercased string with normalized whitespace and all non latin letters replaced. Or null

      • loadLocalDicts

        public void loadLocalDicts(File folder)
        Reads synonym dicts from given folder. File names must be the same as on rs.gbif.org.

      • loadClasspathDicts

        public void loadClasspathDicts(String classpathFolder)
                        throws IOException
        Reads synonym dicts from given classpath root path. File names must be the same as on rs.gbif.org.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadOnlineDicts

        public void loadOnlineDicts()
        Reloads all synonym files found on rs.gbif.org replacing existing mappings.

      • setSynonyms

        public void setSynonyms(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Rank rank,
               Map<String,String> synonyms)
        Sets the synonym lookup map for a given rank. Names will be normalised and checked for existance of the same entry as key or value.
        Parameters:
        rank -
        synonyms -

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        the number of entries across all ranks

      • size

        public int size(org.gbif.api.vocabulary.Rank rank)
        Returns:
        the number of entries for a given rank
